snippet: Doctors talk about science, but they also believe deeply in chance.
abstract: Dr Kent A Sepkowitz essay describes the superstitious tendencies and preoccupations with luck that are common among doctors, despite their evidence-based worldviews.
lead_paragraph: Doctors talk about science, but they also believe deeply in chance.

headline.seo: For Doctors, Luck Can Explain What They Themselves Cannot
headline.main: Answers in Medicine Sometimes Lie in Luck
headline.print_headline: Answers In Medicine Sometimes Lie in Luck
